meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Caroline Cawley Frank Orlando John Presloid Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7909.

td.p: Caroline Cawley, a research associate from San Mateo, California
Frank Orlando, a professor from Wesley Chapel, Florida
John Presloid, a microbiologist from Perrysburg, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,000)

tr.td: STATES & PROVINCES
A TROPHY CATEGORY
HOLY THIS!
"C" IN COOKING
FER SURE, IT WAS THE '80s
ITALIAN ON VACATION

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
